description: Lists data source runs in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: dataSourceIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which to invoke the ListDataSourceRuns action.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListDataSourceRuns action.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when a data source run was created.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source of the data source run.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorDetail
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorType
nested_items.description: The type of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source run.

nested_items.name: lineageSummary
nested_items.description: The run lineage summary of a data source.

nested_items.name: importStatus
nested_items.description: The import status that's part of the run lineage summary of a data source.

nested_items.name: projectId
nested_items.description: The project ID of the data source run.

nested_items.name: runStatisticsForAssets
nested_items.description: The asset statistics from the data source run.

nested_items.name: added
nested_items.description: The added statistic for the data source run.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: The failed statistic for the data source run.

nested_items.name: skipped
nested_items.description: The skipped statistic for the data source run.

nested_items.name: unchanged
nested_items.description: The unchanged statistic for the data source run.

nested_items.name: updated
nested_items.description: The updated statistic for the data source run.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when a data source run was started.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data source run.

nested_items.name: stoppedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when a data source run was stopped.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the data source run.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when a data source run was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of runs is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of runs, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListDataSourceRuns to list the next set of runs.
